pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, June 12, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12 p.m.

2 p.m.      The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4 p.m.      The Prime Minister will meet with the Dairy Farmers of Canada.

Closed to media

5:15 p.m.  The Prime Minister will meet with the United Nations Secretary-Generalâ€™s Special Envoy for Health in 2030 Agenda and for Malaria, Ray Chambers, and the founder and CEO of WomenOne, Dayle Haddon.

Closed to media
